[More Safely & Healthier] Kettle's inner lid, spout and filter are made of food-grade 304 stainless steel. No plastic contaminates water due to the BPA-free and FDA-approved Material. [Fast-Boiling & Large Capacity] With 1500 watts of power, this stainless steel electric kettle can quickly heats up water within 5-6 minutes, effectively shortening waiting time. 1.7L electric kettle can provide about 8 cups of water for your whole day drinking. [Easy to Clean & Store] A wide mouth is easy for cleaning and filling, allowing you to totally reach into the bottom of the stainless steel kettle to clean inside limescale. The cord can be stored into the power base when not use, and the slender body is suitable to place on counter top without occupying too much area.

[Worry-Free Warranty] No need to worry about quality problems, we offers 45-day refund and 18-month replacement risk-free after-sales guarantee for you. Please feel free to contact us when you meet any questions or problems. productDescription: Habor is a brand passionately specializes in delivering high-end and most valuable household appliances and supplies in the market. We talk & listen to our customers and value every constructive feedback to improve our products and services.

Equipped the newest water circling heating technology and 1500W high power, this electric kettle heats up water faster and quieter than some other water pots on the market. Only takes about 7 minutes to boil 1.7L water. No more long time waiting. It will shuts ff when the water is fully boiled or if boil-dry, don't worry about any safety problem even people leave it alone.

It has a double-wall construction, which has two advantages: one is the outer layer of plastic stays cool to the touch even as the water boils inside. The other one is that this double wall structure can help keeping warm for half an hour after the power off.

Designed with advanced inbuilt thermostat control, the stainless steel kettle has a built-in auto shut off when the water is fully boiled or if boil-dry to stop accidents from occurring, saving you the headache of monitoring. It is an excellent choice for replacing microwave ovens, stoves or old kettles.

Study skidproof handle enables you to fill and pour the hot water safely, also it is convenient for you to hold the kettle while cleaning. The 360-degree swivel base is a new upgraded design that is possible for your kettle connecting to the power base at any angle.
Equipped with the blue led indicator, this electric kettle can remind you of the working status. It is on working status when the light on and it will turn off after it boiled

reviews.reviewTitle: CORDLESS KETTLE. Make teas or seal box braids lol
reviews.reviewText:
I’m impressed. The kettle itself isn’t attached to the cord. You put it on the base and simply lift and pour when ready to use. It’s essentialy CORDLESS. I’ve never had a electric kettle before. Loving the double walled structure because I’m accident prone lol. So I don’t feel the hot water inside. Heats up super quick. Had tea ready in less than five minutes. Yes yes yes. Highly recommend. Make sure you clean the kettle per instructions first.

Especially for braiders/hair stylists. Great for curling or sealing ends on braiding hair since you can move the kettle to the client without having to worry about a cord.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice looking and fast heating kettle.
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking kettle and seems like very good quality. Comes with a manual, but is way easy to use. Poor water into kettle, press bottom lever, lift kettle from stand and you’re good. Heats up water really fast; full around 7 minutes. Interior is stainless and high quality. Looks great on my counter. I love it.

I was looking for a kettle to prepare coffee and tea, and this fit the bill quite nicely.
Originally I was looking for a variable temperature model, but after looking at the limited offerings
and their quality, this kettle looked like a better fit. It boils water quickly,
and keeps it around boiling for a minute or two then powers off. It's just the right amount of time for
me to set up my french press and coffee grounds while it boils. Lifting the kettle bumps the switch to
off so it doesn't start up again after it is set on the base again. Minimum capacity is 2 cups or 16 ounces,
which comes out to a well-sized coffee mug for me. Outside stays cold-warm unless it's used more than
two times in a row which would be unusual outside of the first-time use prep.

Ease of use is great, with only one switch with a light and a button on top to raise the lid.
The interior is all stainless steel, though after the first-time use prep I did find the markings
other reviewers have seen appear at the bottom. The power chord also wraps around
nicely inside/under the base. The finish is matt black, but not too shiny and it fits quite nicely
next to the black/stainless oven range. After a month of steady usage it still
looks as good as new and no rust buildup. Of course never store this wet, as that would promote oxidation.
This came fast and well packaged - it fits A lot of water and heated up in about 10 minutes to make tea. Nice to be able to take this in my garage or to a friends back yard.

Excellent product. I brought it to use in my home for assorted instant things (Tea, coffee) that I enjoy. And BPA free is the main reason I selected this model.
So far I love this kettle, with important features being the stainless steel construction, the shiny black exterior appearance, the high quality of manufacture, and the value for money it represents. The cordless feature is essential in my view for any modern kettle.
The kettle is beautiful and it gets not hot to the touch due to it's double wall. It's attractive and easy to handle. It definitely boils the water. I would definitely use it for my tea every day.
Overall this is excellent quality, well-featured and a great value! I highly recommend.

My mom has one of these, and I've always been eyeing hers. Finally pulled the trigger and got one of my own. It is a little bigger than I thought it would be. I imagined taking it along on trips for my husband who loves having his drip coffee, but it is a little on the larger side for that. But it works great, and it's super easy to use. Just one button, and the water heats up pretty quickly. Love the black color. Looks sleek and works great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Boils fast but not a fan of how the lid opens up.
reviews.reviewText: Design is simple and I really like the fact that you can get the whole kettle boiling in just 5 minutes. What I'm not a fan of is the lid will not open all the way. If you lift the lid, it is angled at a 45 degrees opening. This makes cleaning the inside a little difficult and I had to be careful so I don't break the lid. That's my only complaint. Otherwise, it is a good, fast boiling kettle.

The interior is fully stainless steel which is super durable. Takes very little time to start boiling. Capacity is enough for 5-6 cup. But inspite of being well constructed it's very light. It also has a auto power off method for safety.

I cant believe that even the seller is answering questions here stating this kettle is plastic free. While there is mainly made of stainless steel, there are two pieces which are plastic: 1) a plastic button that attaches the handle and 2) a piece of the lid is plastic and will be kept inside the jar once the lid is close.
Even if these two parts are not supposed to touch the water, they will sure be affected by the steam of boiling water.
The seller should not advertise this as plastic free! Shame! It's going back

Shorter than comparable plastic bodied products, this kettle boils 1.7L of cold water in 5 minutes. It features a stainless steel body which means no viewing the water scale build up on the inside. Instead of heating cup by cup of water in the microwave or for the whistling kettle on the range top, this electric kettle is the way to go. This is an awesome way to REALLY heat up THOROUGHLY water for tea, hot chocolate, ramen noodles and the like. Easy instructions to follow. Love that the electric cord wraps around the underside of the heating plate when not in use. After heating several pots of water to rinse it, I was set to go. Would have preferred cups measurements (especially since it says the capacity is 7.2 cups) and not liters on the kettle but I'll live.

I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I DONT KNOW WHAT TOOK ME SO LONG TO BUY!! .. its out of the way, i can use it in my bedroom, office or anywhere i can plug it in. I dont have to worry about my boiling water into a pot and pouring into a cup. Washing dirty dishes just to boil water. It takes less then 3 minutes to boil. It is safe for my ten year old to use to make her got chocolate. It doesnt take much room and you hear it working INSTANTLY.. YES I AM IN LOVE WITH IT AND ALL MY FAMILY USES IT. I USED IT FOR TEA( WHICH I LOVE) MY HUSBAND FOR HIS COFFEE AND MY DAUGHTER FOR HER HOT CHOCOLATE.. AND I KNOW I CAN USE IT FOR OTHER ITEMS LIKE CUP OF SOUP, BROTH ETC...

reviews.reviewTitle: Boils water quickly, is clean, perfect for students!
reviews.reviewText: The Habor electric kettle has an elegant look and a stainless steel interior that boils water throughly and leaves no plastic taste. I love how it can be removed from the base with ease if you want to pour the steaming water into a mug or bowl. The electric kettle is extremely intuitive as there is only 1 on/off switch. Also, inside the boiler, there are measurements for 1/2, 1, and 1 1/2 Liters. The water boils relatively quickly, in around 3 minutes for half a liter and 5 minutes for a liter, so it's really convenient in mornings. This is perfect for students because it can be easily used to boil water for tea, oatmeal, and instant noodles. The all stainless steel interior and wide opening make it very easy to clean. The kettle looks elegant with an all black finish, and is not hot to touch after the water boils.

Im super excited about this purchase! I work in a warehouse where it is super cold in the winter months, and you want nothing more than something HOT to drink. I brought a pack of hot chocolate as well as some tea to work for this occasion. It comes with instructions, but it's super easy! Make sure to follow the cleaning instructions. You NEVER feel the heat on the outside of the kettle, water only touches the stainless steel. I pour some water in and turned it on, in about 5-7 min BOOM Hot water! While my nose is red, hands are icicles, my belly and heart is warm in this frigid warehouse! Def recommend! Winter wont stop me this year!

I usually just microwave water for tea, but apparently that's not the "right" way to do it and kept getting flack from my friends for it. I finally decided to buy an electric kettle and chose this one cuz it's well priced and has good reviews. I love it! Boils water quickly even when filled to max capacity which is almost 2 liters. There's no weird taste or anything used straight out of the box, but I did clean it by boiling 3 cycles before using the water for tea. I also used it to clean my garage disposal and makes boiling water for pasta quicker and easier! I don't know why I waited so long to buy a kettle, I love this thing!

This cordless electric kettle is amazing. I am looking forward to using it more. It boils water really fast, depending on how much water you put to boil. I put about half a liter and it boiled super quick, within a few minutes. I like that the kettle has a light up switch to turn the kettle on and off, also how it has auto turn off setting in the kettle, great for busy and forgetful people. Can't wait to keep using this and making my life easier. Great kettle, lovely addition to your kitchen small appliances.

Just got this kettle to replace a burned out one. They seems to last about 3 years. It's good but 2 problems.

There's no way to see from the outside how full it is, you have to open the lid and look inside. When I opened the lid I got a few drops of hot water on my hand so be careful.

The lid only opens to about 45 degrees so peeking inside to see how full it is means tilting it. It may make cleaning a bit harder too.

I'll probably keep it but look for a better one in 3 years.

Not only is this very stylish but it also works magic! It heats up REALLY fast and it’s super easy to keep clean. I love that the bottom part doesn’t get hot so I don’t have to worry about my kids reaching on the counter and accidentally touching it and burning their fingers. Definitely a big plus for me because I’m always scared of that happening. I love that I can have my tea ready in minutes because usually I’m crunched for time! I would definitely recommend this to anyone who enjoys a good cup of tea

reviews.reviewTitle: Boils water quickly and it shuts down automatically
reviews.reviewText:
Very happy with my kettle. I bought the glass one before finding this one and was in love with it, but for aesthetic and convenience reasons changed to all metal. I like this one a lot better. Not too heavy yet very sturdy. Boils water very quickly and it has an auto-off function for when is done boiling water. It looks nice over my counter so I don't even need to store it and can leave it outside.

Definitely recommend

I feel like this is not stainless more like a metal but not sure what it is made of. After using few times, it’s a bit rusted inside and the water doesn’t taste well. The positive thing for the kettle is that it will boil your water fast.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to put together and use!
reviews.reviewText: This electric kettle works great. It heats up water very quickly which means it’s both energy and time efficient. I love the polished black color of the kettle. It is quite easy to put together and use. The only minor concern is that water level mark is inside the kettle so it’s a bit hard to gauge where the water level is. Overall, really enjoyed the convenience of having a electric kettle, especially this one.

It has that matt black chic look to it. Fits perfect with my modern kitchen. Very easy to use, just plug in tab the button down, when its boiled it stops automatically. Its a good size kettle which is great cuz we eat cup of noodles all the time and i always had to go second round but you can just boil it once and it makes few cup of noodles and some tea. It boils fast too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Large capacity, very efficient, stainless steel inside
reviews.reviewText: Does very efficiently what it is meant to do. I use it for multiple purposes because it boils very fast, is high powered and durable. I boil milk in it, eggs sometimes and water for my black tea most of the time.. it takes very less time, is high powered, good quality, beautiful outside and stainless steel inside. Working really fine till now, has high capacity.

didn't know an electric kettle would be this useful for a kitchen. Cooking tea or coffee is easier & faster with this kettle. Seems very convenient to operate, water boils real quick, and found the blue light indicator an additional feature, light turns off when water boils and the kettle turns off automatically. it has ample storage with 1.7 litre capacity. nice look.

reviews.reviewTitle: I make tea twice as fast now!
reviews.reviewText: This electric kettle makes hot water extremely fast and the best part is that it auto shuts off so if I ever forget it on, it won't cause any harm. I've forgotten the stove on many times and this is great so I never forget. It's made form awesome material and the inside is all stainless steel. It has a blue indicator light near the switch. Great electric kettle over all!

This is my second one....my sister borrowed mine so I went ahead and got a new one. I have owned many kettles bc they are great for everything...even cleaning when you need hot water fast. I really like the way this one looks on my counter. I had a stainless one and constantly had to shine it and the clear ones you see water stains. This always looks nice.

First off, this kettle is quick. I received it today. After washing it, I used it right away. I had boiling water within 5 minutes (didn't fill out up all the way). I loved how simple it was to operate and that the kettle itself is cordless. I also enjoy the double wall carafe. Im using this one for camping in a few weeks and looking forward to hot tea!

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for making tea and hot cocoa
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for making tea and hot cocoa. Just fill up the water and turn it on. I don’t have to worry about forgetting it when the water is boiled since it will turn the unit off automatically. Another nice feature is the boil-dry protection which turn the unit off when there is no water inside the kettle. I recommended this electric kettle to my friends and family members.
It tastes great and seems to have been used. I submitted the first comment failed, but I must ask for the second time. The reason is that this is the worst product I have purchased.

First of all, it looks absolutely stunning! It got a full-body black armor, with a shiny diamond-like hat. The inside, along with the heating plate is made of 100% food-grade stainless steel.
Second of all, it heats up fast. It took less than 5 minutes to boil about 1.5L of water. And even when it reaches the boiling point, the outside is only slightly warm to the touch.
For this price, I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Well made - Perfect for hot water
reviews.reviewText: I bought this a few weeks ago and was skeptical because of the price. I liked the shape of this which looked more like a tea kettle. Great Product, does exactly what the description says it does. Use it every day, and Love that auto shut off feature. Quickly heats water to a boil and makes a perfect cup of tea. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works as expected. Convenient to use
reviews.reviewText: The product perfectly matches the product description. I have triied heating water in it many times and have not seen any problems yet. The kettle is quite big as advertised and is super convenient to use. The body of the kettle looks really sturdy and the build quality seems to be much better than what I was expecting in this price range. The only complain I have with this product is that the wire length is not that adequate but everything else about it is absolutely perfect.

This is a nice electric kettle. It heats quickly, and shuts off once it reaches boiling. The design is simple and good looking. The cord is not attached to the kettle, but instead to a base that the kettle docks to, it’s nice to not have a cord to deal with while pouring from the kettle. I really like this electric kettle.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Kettle you,ve been waiting for. All Electric
reviews.reviewText: Great water heater. It eliminates the need for gas because it's all electric. Nice cover release button. This product is very easy to use and would recommend to anyone looking for water boiler. Heats water quick and can home lots of it. It can hold plenty water for 12 cups of tea. Or more depending on cup size. A+

This kettle is great. A nice matte black outer appearance and a nice stainless steel inside. Simply fill with water (between the min and max lines) and press the button to start. The water boils and then stays hot for a long time in the kettle. It is perfect for pouring over my pour over coffee maker.

Got this today and couldn’t wait to open it and make some tea. The kettle heated quickly and I live the heating base is separate from the kettle. I turned it off and then the kids wanted hot chocolate so I went back about 20 minutes later and the water was still hot. Absolutely love this product!

This thing is amazing! Even more amazing for traveling! If you have an RV or any type of traveling home then this is a must have! Even in a regular house it is great. Boils the water super fast and you can pour it very easily. It was designed to be as convenient as possible and you can tell! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: Safe & efficient, for quick hot water!
reviews.reviewText: It heats water quickly & efficiently, automatically turn off when it done. It is easy to fill, either on the counter or at the sink. I also enjoy the modern look of it. I just wish the lid can open all the way so it's easier for me to wash it. Other than that, it is a good product for the price

Similar design to one I had for several years. The pluses: retains heat much longer, good volume, quick heating and easy on-off toggle. It turns itself off pretty quickly (good when you walk away).

Not-so good: lid is hard to open and is fixed (I like this feature), will bubble over/spill if you fill beyond fill line (my old one did the same).

Overall I like it better than my old one that died. I just find the button to open the fill lid is hard...but it really is a nice insulated hot water heater for the price.

This is on the spendier side of kettles from what I was looking at, but the sleek design and fast heating elements makes it worth it! I bought this for my work desk with winter coming, I drink a lot of tea and pour over coffee. This is great size lasts me most the day!

I used to use an electric kettle to make my tea, and would always be inconvenienced by the cord getting in the way. This cordless kettle makes pouring so much easier, and cleaning as well. It also insults better than my plastic one, which is great. I wish the lid could come off so I could clean easier, but it's a good tradeoff.

I make tea and/or pour over coffee every morning - this has helped me with that process. I no longer have to get out pots and pans to heat up my water. The kettle heats up water quickly and effectively. Easy to clean and a great quality. Additionally, it loosk great on the countertop!

I was looking for something which is not plastic to boil the water, Found this better for this price and ordered it. It works great and value for the money I paid, It's heating faster than Plastic and no harm. Having a satisfied feeling of replaced a plastic.

This electric kettle is perfect for tea drinkers. Heats water very quickly, the kettle is insulated and holds the warmth. Water comes at out a perfect not quite boiling heat. Very easy to reheat if you chose to leave water on the kettle for awhile. Has an automatic shut off and will sensor to ensure it does not over-boil to a dry kettle. Very pleased with our purchase.

This kettle is a must in every household! It is stainless steel.
It only takes a few minutes to boil the water. I love its double wall insulation. The outside is safe to touch even which is a plus for me. Sturdy but lightweight. I highly recommend this product!

This is a great cordless electric kettle. Only the base has a cord but the kettle itself just sits on top of the base. Takes only a few minutes to boil a full kettle and turns off when it's done. Outside of kettle gets warm but not hot which is really nice.

Love this kettle and the price is just perfect. The cord stores underneath the base and simple to use. Heats up super quick. Had tea ready in less than five minutes. Highly recommend. Please make sure you clean the kettle, first before using it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very helpful since I don't have a kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: This electric kettle so so easy to use! I don't have a kitchen in my apartment so having a way to quickly and easily heat water is super helpful. Whether I'm making tea, coffee, or ramen noodles this kettle has been super clutch!

I like the fact that the outside stays cool while the inside holds boiling water makes this a safe and effective appliance for my home. It also has an automatic shut off feature which is also a great safety feature. It boils water quickly and is a sharp looking kettle.

I had never used an electric kettle before. I love making fresh tea and have hated using my gas stove in the summer. This has solved all my problems. No unnecessary heat being thrown into the house and it heats the water quick! Great product!

This product looks unique and stylish. Heats well and great indicator of the temperatures. Worked Great and great quality. Auto shut off feature is great that i am not worried for over heating my tea anymore.

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome Electric kettle for everyday use
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best electric kettle. Boiles water fast and it's easy to use. The design is slick. Cleaning the kettle is quick and easy. It also automatically switches off once the water is boiled. Highly recommended product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Back for current kettle, but using it instead!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a back up for my old kettle as it is getting to the end of its life. When this arrived I took a look at it and decided to bin the old one. This looks cool, matches my kitchen and heat quickly.

This electric kettle is awesome! My fiance and I are both tea-drinkers and until this purchase, we had been using the microwave or podless Keurig to heat water. Now, we can simply fill the kettle, press a button, and wait a minute for the water to boil. This kettle is not only convenient, but it's also very stylish. It has a textured design around the top and along the bottom edge. Plus, it is large enough to brew several cups of tea at once and it's super easy to use. I will never go back to my old ways of microwaving a cup of water to brew my tea!
this kettle is high efficient with quick heating features. It is well insulated and can be shut down automatically. I loved the overall experience of using this product. Must have for the kitchens.

Black Stains less steel finish feels good to the hand and very pretty. Water heats up quickly. Is easy to clean and maintain. Detached from base, big plus point here. Heating coils aren’t in direct contact with water.

This electric kettle is cordless. It is easy to use and heats up so fast. I don’t need to set up a temperature and shut off automatically. By the way, with stainless steel not difficult to clean at all!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice and fast hot water.
reviews.reviewText: We have a plastic one of these and it does ok but this one is faster and feels luxurious compared to plastic. Water seems hotter much quicker. I like that it is metal. Has a boil over shut off.

Super light and super fast!! I could have my morning tea in less than 5 minutes. The interior is stainless which make it so easy to clean and use each time. I could pack this to work or camping and not have to worry about breaking it. Highly recommended!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Durable, nice material, but not the easiest to clean
reviews.reviewText: A nice solid water heater. Good size for use by up to 4 people. The stainless steel finish is nice and seems very durable. One minor thing that bothered me was that the cover does not come completely off and does not flip over completely, making cleaning the inside with a brush a bit harder than I would have liked.

reviews.reviewTitle: A must have for tea lovers
reviews.reviewText: After years of boiling water in a pot on the stove for tea I finally decided to invest in this gem. I love it. My tea tastes so much better now. I wish I would’ve purchased this sooner.

I’ve only had it for a few weeks, but so far I’m happy with my purchase. this small electric kettle is perfect to stick in a corner of my tiny kitchen but it’s very handy. It is simple to use and heats up water fast in about 4-5 mins. I only boil water so there’s not really a reason to clean it that often, I just rinse it with water everyday.

I like the plastic body of the kettle because it doesn't get hot from outside and the water remains hot for longer time due to the inner stainless steel body. It has auto-shutoff function so that you don't have to wait with it to turn it off. Just come back later and find your hot water. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: Maintaining heat for those who are forgetful!
reviews.reviewText: Heats fast. The lid doesnt open all the way making cleaning a little difficult. Bit only water goes in there and if you dump it and air dry it shouldn't be too bad. Steel so maintained temp of water for a good while. Overall great product!

This electric kettle is great. It heats just as quickly as my microwave and keeps the water hot for quite a while. I’d rather the kids use this for their ramen noodles than a pot on the stovetop. It takes up very little counter space.

This one heats up the water pretty soon. It is a double layered which makes it safe to use.

Design is also simple ,efficient & nice looking.It looks great on my counter too

It’s a cute lil but great addition to my kitchen. The power cord is short on purpose to keep the cord from tangling up when in use. Just fill the kettle with water and plug it in the outlet. It heats up a full pot in a few minutes and the kettle turns off after boiling.

Just received it and tried it out today. Works as intended, seems like a nice quality product. I am very happy with it. Makes tea and boils water so much faster than conventional methods. Would recommend.
I highly recommend this Elecrtic kettle! Double wall so it keeps the water hot inside and we can touch the outside stays cool. It boils the water so quick! Overheating protection. I just love it!
I chose it because of those good reviews. When I got it, I was disappointed. The power base is made of very thin plastic. The boiled water still has obvious plastic taste till now.
I purchased this item as a gift for a college student. It is a wonderful way to heat water with just an electrical outlet. Many of my friends use this in their kitchen for tea and coffee.
I love using this. I like having hot working on hand at all times. This is perfect for that. I use it for tea, or anything honestly. Works great for a small office with no kitchen.
Easy to clean and use. Perfect for every day use for many things. I use this for tea, coffee and other drinks. Looks good on the kitchen shelf and does the job well.

Im in love with this kettle, first of all is very stylish. The design is pretty cool, i love the lid. I love the open button for the lid. It doesn’t feel cheap, heats up the water really quick. No more microwave or stove to heat up water. Excellent product, nothing to complaint about.
This kettle looks amazing and works well! I am definitely a fan of it. The kettle itself is easy to clean, though I would like the lid to lift up a little higher. I do recommend this product :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Say hello to fast and efficient water kettle
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent product for heating up water for green tea or generally. Its quick, efficient and top it off less space consuming... with the winter coming up it couldn't have been more useful... and to top it off the price is quite competitive too..

I absolutely love this electric kettle. It works great for my needs and makes excellent boiled water. It is convenient, looks modern and stylish and is very easy to clean. I highly recommend it to others!
Very good water heater. Heats water faster than my regular stove top. Very easy to use. Makes making my pour over coffee easier and faster to make. Fits plenty of water.
I like this kettle, simple black design and enough capacity. Easy to make boiling water Just put some water and press switch. Non slip handle is safe.
This electric kettle makes a good gift for a college freshman moving into the dorm. It heats water very quickly. I was impressed with how quiet and quick it is.
This is a nice kettle. Easy to use and easy to clean. Great for travel or camping.. gets the water the right temp and also cools down qickly

Awesome kettle for daily use. We use it for preparing tea and boiling water for making instant foods like oatmeals and noodles. It has a stainless steel body which makes it sturdier then other glass kettles available in the market. Heats the water instantaneously within minutes with no mess. It auto shuts off when water is boiled. Highly recommend it if you are looking for a good quality kettle.

I have to say, I am rather impressed at how quick water does boil inside this electric kettle. After the recommended cleaning with vinegar & a few rinses it was ready to go. The base has a convenient cord wrap built into the bottom of it & the kettle sits firmly in place on the base. I started with .5 liter (2 cups) of water & it boiled in less than three minutes & the power automatically shut off ten seconds after of a good rolling boil. The kettle is effortless to remove from the base & pouring out hot water through the spout didn't create any leftover drips. The switch is on when you flip it and a blue light appears. When water starts heating up, it sounds like a volcano so you definitely know it is working. Press the button on the handle to open the lid & be careful, as steam will rise out.
Hot water does stay hot for quite a bit, and the kettle dried itself when empty. The outside of the kettle was slightly warm at best.

reviews.reviewTitle: Yes! Electric kettles are generally awesome! This one is not!
reviews.reviewText:
Anyone who has ever used an electric kettle before (which does not seem to include most reviewers) will be disappointed by the shoddy workmanship and weird design decisions of this kettle.

First off, the thing doesn't have a fill gauge, so you can't tell how much water is in it. That's a pretty major deviation from kettle standards and it's stupid. Secondly, both the kettle and the base are made of such flimsy material that it's virtually impossible to sit the kettle flat on the counter when it's empty. It feels cheap. Lastly, if you pour the water out at any real rate, the lid half opens and boiling water comes out of the top.

There are probably more fun and dangerous flaws out there for us to find, but after the first boil, we packed it up and sent it back.

Yes, electric kettles are fantastic! But keep your standards higher, people!

This electric kettle heats up water pretty fast. Faster than the microwave. It will hold a max of 1.7 liters, which is a little over 7 (8 oz) cups. The only unfortunate thing is that the lid doesn't completely open which makes it a little difficult to fill, but otherwise it works well.
I am a tea drinker, and i use a specialty loose tea. I prefer loose tea because whole tea leaves give a better flavor than ground up tea leaves and tea bags have a funny taste. So the electric kettle is a great thing to have at the house and at work. I heat up my water, put it and the tea leaves in my french press and let it steep. The tea tastes perfect, and it's much faster than a kettle on the stove, microwave, or heating bunches of water in the keurig.

Nice looking
Can leave in counter or put away
So simple to use
Works great

This kettle is really fast and simple. There is no setup or complicated buttons to press; there is only 1 'lever' that doubles as a light indicator, it will turn blue while heating and will turn off after boiling the water.
Just fill it with water (maximum capacity is 1.7 liters) and in a few minutes you will have boiling water to prepare tea, coffee, hot cocoa, ramen noodles, oatmeal or anything else.
I'm a coffee drinker and I always use my coffee maker. Since I got this electric kettle I have been drinking more tea. The temperature is perfect and much better than heating water in the microwave.
I mentioned before that it is fast. I would say 3-5 minutes and you have boiling water ready to go.
The inside is stainless steel and has a double wall structure. The water has no strange flavors. The electric cord wraps around the underside of the heating plate when not in use.
Things to improve: I wish the base was made out of steel and that the lid can be completely removed for better cleaning.

reviews.reviewTitle: Less Chance of Burns With Cool Exterior
reviews.reviewText: This is the third electric kettle that I have owned and it is the best of the three. The last one I had was stainless outside, which looked nice, but with single-wall construction the exterior got hot and I had to be careful when lifting the kettle and pouring out the hot water. This one has a nice insulating layer on the outside which prevents burning myself. I like the cord storage under the base so it's out of the way when not in use. It's nice having the kettle cordless so I can carry it to the kitchen table to make myself another cup of tea. The markings on the inside make it easy for me to fill with the amount of water I need. These kettles can develop scale, so I use distilled water and I don't have to clean out the kettle and it stays nice. This kettle delivers hot water fast, much better than boiling on the stove in a conventional whistler teapot or in the microwave.

First off—the design of this kettle is quite sleek, and makes for an attractive piece in the kitchen.

In terms of functionality, I am very happy with how quickly the kettle is able to raise the temperature of the water to a boil, and the double-wall construction allows for much safer operation. No need to worry about burning my hands by accidentally touching the sides of the kettle!

The kettle itself is quite simple to fill, with a wide mouth. I have had poor experiences wit kettles with cords in the past, so I am very pleased with the ability to simply pick up the kettle without having to worry about managing the cable.

Overally, I am very pleased with this kettle, and would be very happy to recommend this to anyone looking for a great kettle for a decent price!

reviews.reviewTitle: This electric kettle is totally worth the money!
reviews.reviewText:
The BEST thing about this electric kettle is the outer surface won’t get hot while boiling.
I’ve two cats which they won’t get hurt because of the heat of the surface.
I have a stainless steel kettle before and my cats always lean on it. I’m afraid that they might get hurt one day.
Maximum volume of water is 1.7L which I think is really good.
Also, while boiling, it has a blue indicator (I think blue light is way better than the traditional red light) on telling you that it’s boiling.
The interior of the kettle is stainless steel which I think is safe to drink the water.
Overall, I think this electric kettle is totally worth it big reason because the surface won’t get hot while boiling.

This one has been one of my favorites.

I love that it is black on the outside vs just the stainless steel look. It has more of modern look to it. and the whole Cylindrical shape make is more modern looking vs anything that is rounded.
It heats up water fast, too!

I really like that it has the volume markings on the inside so it takes the guess work out of measurement. My previous water tea kettle had a viewing chamber but the paint had worn off and it was hard to see.

Overall, really looking forward to using this for a long time!

reviews.reviewTitle: Really puts time back in my schedule
reviews.reviewText: When your wife is pregnant and you want to survive, you do whatever you can to make her comfortable. Bring blankets, rub feet, make late night grocery store runs. Above all that, you bring her tea. Now, with pregnancy, the teas vary. It’s not always the same comforting chamomile. Frankly, I got sick of making multiple cups a night I. The microwave and this little Swedish kid on the news made me second guess my heating apparatus of choice. So I got this electric kettle and joy of joys woes be gone! It’s so easy to set up and use and once you make the first pot you’re done for the night. Now I have time to rub my own feet and the kettle stays warm cup after cup

The base is connected to the electrical cord which makes it very easy to manipulate the kettle. The lining of the kettle is stainless steel and it cleans very easily. The water heats up very quickly and the kettle stops heating once the water reaches the correct temperature. reviews.reviewText: As it says in the instructions, the less the water the fastest it heats up. Two big cups of water will normally heat up to a decent chamomile tea temperature in about 3 minutes. The other nice touch is the electrical cord’s storage space in the base, no need to have the cord dangling around.

reviews.reviewTitle: Electric kettle that's fast and won't break your wallet
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for 2 days at my house. My parents like to drink their tea and coffee with very hot water. I'm quite surprised how fast this kettle can boil water. I read the reviews first and like everyone says it's a good wishing kettle. It takes about 6 minutes or so to boil a full picture of water in the kettle. You don't have to boil a full of pitcher. I've heated half to quarter full and it takes less time. What's great about this is the inside is all stainless steel. There is no plastic part inside. And it looks great on my center kitchen island counter. Just take a look at the photo.

We really like this kettle. It was a replacement for our Sunbeam Hot Shot which we thought we could never live without. But the reviews were not good on that product anymore so we purchased this. We like this pot a lot! It takes up only a small space on the counter and heats the water up very fast. The 2 foot cord wraps in a coil and his hidden in the bottom so you pull out only the length you need -- no long cords on the counter-top anymore. It is lightweight and pours easily with no spilling or dripping. It also looks very handsome and appears to be more expensive than it is. This is a very good buy.

I'm so glad I found this kettle, I had one before but it was completely plastic and cheaply built. This kettle on the other hand is well built AND has stainless steel inside.

I also love the fact that the base rotates 360 and lifts off very easily. I've used this for tea, instant ramen and max and cheese. It provided water that more than hot enough.

My only suggestion is that the blue light on the switch be brighter when it's on... But that's only an visual issue.

Overall, this a wonderful replacement to my old kettle.

There are several things that stand out and impress me with this kettle. The fact that the outside stays cool while the inside holds boiling water makes this a safe and effective appliance for my home. It also has an automatic shut off feature which is also a great safety feature. It boils water quickly and is a sharp looking kettle. This product would make a great gift.

This kettle arrived just in time! When the temp drops like it did this week, we enjoy hot tea. This kettle works very easily and quickly.
You plug in the bass, fill the kettle to at least .5L, no more than 1.7L (markings on the inside) and flip the switch at the bottom (the blue light will come on). In a few minutes you have boiled water. Once the blue light clicks off, it is up to temp. You can hear it boil and see the steam, then you can pour your water.
I like that it is lined with stainless steel, no plastic touches the water.

I was drawn to this because I dont have a range in my kitchen. So during the summer it's hot as crap in there. I love hot tea and pour over coffees so am always using a kettle with my stove. Which is gas so like I said that kitchen gets HOT. this is a game changer. It heats up water faster than my kettle does. I dont risk burning myself since the outside doesnt get hot at all. It sits on the charging base to get hot then you lift it off. No unplugging is needed and theres no cord from the actual kettle to the base.

I'm a big tea drinker. Unfortunately, at work we don't have a stove to boil water, only a microwave. It doesn't quite get the water warm enough, or if you set it too long it boils over and makes a mess. This was a great solution. I can get my hot water to make tea in the kettle - it doesn't take that long to get it hot enough and it will even stay warm in the kettle for a while. I have been using it for tea every day and am looking forward to using it all fall and winter for making hot chocolate too. Nice for use in the office or even a dorm room.

I bought this a month ago because I needed a solution to a stove water kettle. This was a solution to have safe, fast hot water. I had a tea kettle and the enamel cracked within 2 years of use and I didn’t know it until I saw black flakes in my tea. I am pretty sure that enamel I was drinking which could be toxic. This water kettle is see through glass and beeps when the water is hot enough. Plus there are multiple temperatures for tea brewing. I use this kettle in the morning for pour over coffee. I love this water kettle. Highly recommend!

I really liked my purchase and would recommend this kettle!

reviews.reviewText: I have been trying to drink more tea and someone suggested that I get an electric kettle. I love the convenience of this. I put water in, press the button and minutes later I have hot water! Easy to pour and love that I can bring it to the table if I have guests over and not be tethered by a cord.

This is a high quality electric kettle. Best part is water only comes in contact with the interior stainless steel. Operation is very simple and your water will be boiled in matter of minutes. Heats up water very fast; full capacity in 7 minutes. Looks great on my counter. Love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality. Its sturdy. Boils water quick!
reviews.reviewText:
Great quality.
Its sturdy and big.
It boiled the whole pot in under 6 minutes.
I love that it only needs to be plugged in while boiling and then you can just take it right off and pour.

This could also work great for a students dorm or a breakroom.

Great kettle. Easy to use. Good for boiling water for my cocoa or tea. Or my little one's formula water. Make sure you clean before using. Cordless. I think I'm going to get my mom one for Christmas. She needs her coffee everyday. Comes with an instruction manual.

This is a great quality stainless steel kettle. It boils very fast and it is very easy to use. This is perfect for every day use. Good value for the money. This will also make a great birthday or Christmas gift. I am very happy with this product and I highly recommend it!

I have been using this kettle daily for more than a week and we love it. We love taking tea and this one is super fast to heat the water and very easy to clean. I have not heated anything else but water. It is a must for our house now, so easy to get use to it

reviews.reviewTitle: Been using this for 3 days and we are loving it.
reviews.reviewText: Usually in the morning, I would go and fill the kettle and heat it on the stove. This pot is no difference but the portability of it, is nice. In the morning, i would just heat it and make my coffee. Then my wife would come later and flip the switch and it was pretty quick.

reviews.reviewTitle: My go to for hot water.
reviews.reviewText: Super fast water heating and doesn’t make much noise, if using it early morning or kate night cup of hot chocolate. The color and material is good, the plastic part doesn’t touch water, that is what I was always worried about, not with this electric kettle anymore.

Finally an easy way to get hot water without having to boiling it on the stove. The kettle is very sleek and im able to get hot water within minutes. The great part about this kettle is that it's cordless and also has an auto shut off just in case you forget.

This Habor kettle is great overall. For the price, this is an excellent value. It takes approximately 3 - 4 minutes to boil a full kettle of water from room temperature. My point of view are Quick boiling, Great value, Easy to use, Sturdy design, Easy to Clean.

The kettle is great for heating up water quick. It syats hot for several hours off the burner.
It also heats up soup and any liquid.
Would recommend to anyone.
I like it has its own wammer. Does hot get hot of you touch the outside.

Didn’t realize how trendy kettles could be - this one is super cute AND ITS STAINLESS STEAL. Plastic kettles gross me out, so this one is a solid stainless steal one for a solid price. And the outside is black, so it’s super easy to clean and stays sleek.

I love to drink green tea in the afternoon or after eating my meal. For the price, this kettle is an excellent value. All you have to do is put some water and turn it on and done. Amazing and I' m loving it!!! No more microwave hot water for me.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality kettle with stainless steel walls
reviews.reviewText: This is a great quality kettle with stainless steel walls inside and looks great from outside. sturdy and firm design and looks durable. its very quick and boils water in no time. i hate using microwave so this is perfect option for boiling water.

This kettle is Helpful for me, since I use it for my coffee, tea routine every morning, it’s so easy to use, and i don’t have any issues with the cord or the kettle itself.
It cooks the water quite fast and the warmth is ok!
Worth for sure!

So, for me the most important thing is kettle have is automatically shutoff option and this one automatically shutoff after it boiled the water. Also, the exterior part doesn’t get hot so you are safe to touch without burning yourself

reviews.reviewTitle: Quick and hot. Just what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: Needed something to get water hot enough to brew tea without boiling water on the stove. This gets the water to a good temp in less than 5 minutes without leaving a hot pot or burner exposed to kids or pets. Very happy with my purchase.

Works great! Makes my water hot in minutes and I don't have to occupy the microwave when my colleagues are all trying to heat up their lunch and I'm trying to make my ramen! Feels very sturdy and safe on the counter.

reviews.reviewTitle: You dont need to fill it. If you need a little water just add a little and it will heat faster.
reviews.reviewText: Heats up fast. Nice size if you ate have tea for a party. Shuts off automatically.

It is well designed. I use it for tea water. It heats up very fast. Very helpful in the morning. It is sturdy and durable. As it is double walled it is safe to hold outside. It can hold a lot of water. It is very easy to clean.

This kettle is great! It is super fast at boiling water. It also looks really nice and sleek, and the best part is that it is stainless steel from the inside, so no mold! It's also a good size. Would recommend!

The Habor Electric Kettle heats quickly, and doesn't give off a metal taste in your drink. I tried it for a cup of tea as soon as it was delivered! I will be sure to use this for the kids oatmeal and bottles! Also, I love the design!

I have used this a couple of times since receiving & I’m very happy with how well it works.
It’s a size nice for serving multiple people or when you need a lot of water heated & it heats up quickly.

Works super well. Our last kettle broke and I wanted a replacement that was larger than my last. This holds so much water and heats up quickly too. I really like it. I cant wait for fall to make lots of hot chocolate for the kiddos!

I love this product I have always used Electric Tea Kettles because they heat water more efficiently and effectively than on the stove.
This one has been one of my favorites and highly recommend making the purchase.

The electric teakettle is just what you need to make that cup of hot tea! It heats up before you know it! Safe food-grade materials made to be safe- no scalding, yet keeps liquids hot. Automatic shut off.

I have to say that this does heat up the water rather quickly. It's essentially a cordless kettle because the interior kettle doesn't even touch the base that has the cord that heats it up. It's pretty awesome, we love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Just what you want in an electric kettle.
reviews.reviewText: I've used electric kettles before and this one is by far the best one I've bought. It is sturdy and comfortable to touch and hold and, of course, it boils water rapidly. What else can you ask for.

We had a smaller kettle and when we are drinking water all at a time or need or large quantity hot water it was not enough and bought this Kettle. This is super quick on getting the water heat and easy for clean and use.

does exactly what its supposed to. boils quickly, holds plenty of water and doesn't take up much counter space. very easy to clean since the inside is nice smooth metal and it doesn't leave any metallic aftertaste.
I was looking for a kettle to make coffee and tea, and this fit perfectly. It boils water quickly and keeps it boiling for one or two minutes and then turns off. The capacity is a good size for me.

Very much enjoy using this!! Has great overall flavor without a doubt!! So easy to use that anyone can and cleaning was an absolute breeze.. I have tried others in the past and this is the best by far!

It heats up the water for my tea so fast. This is going to make my life so much easier. I also love that it holds a lot of water inside so I don’t have to boil multiple times. Good value ! Would defensively recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect Way to start the morning
reviews.reviewText: Finally found an affordable large enough water boiler. Love the color and how it compliments my kitchen. Water boils fast and easy clean up. I use it almost everyday especially for my pour over coffee.
We like hot tea and hot chocolate in our house. It's nice to not turn on the gas stove to get the water boiling, especially in the warmer months. Also convenient if you go camping. I'd recommend.

Poor build. The bottom of the kettle arrived sticking out and was not properly fitted. I was able to pop it back in but it is still feels loose on one part. Look elsewhere for a quality electric kettle.
I love the simple design. It is able to boil water relatively fast. This can hold more than 1 liter of water which is plenty when it comes to cooking. Overall, this is a very good product.
Great product, nice quality material, easy to use,easy to clean. You can get the water heated within couple of minutes and best to use while traveling. Its light weight and works amazing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and attractive design

Works as a kettle should - excellent design. It works just like a kettle should and is about the same size as your average kettle, just taller and skinnier, which i prefer
Perfect electric water heater! At 1.7L, it can hold enough water to fill up multiple things at a time! For example, I can fill up multiple noodle bowls or cups of tea! Easy to use!!

The product arrived fast! Its sleek in design and I drink a lot of hot tea this is perfect for it, it heats up fast! And has an automatic shut off so when I lose track of time it shuts off by itself once its reached a certain temperature.
Its not expensive but seems like really good.
Simple setup. Plug in, pour water and toggle the button at the bottom. Kettle looks neat in its design and color. Been using it for couple of days now and so far it’s been perfect
I love this! I use it every single day to use my coffee. I love that it’s cordless and very easy and fast to use. This has become an essential everyday item for me. I definitely recommend.
This electric kettle does the job right. Boils water under 5 mins. I see the performance comparable to the tiger ones found in amazon and Walmart. I like the product and recommend it.

For the price and based on the picture it was a lackluster upon opening. After unboxing I noticed mine seemed used had marks on it and I’m not sure if it was from previous use or if it’s just the material of the item.
I really like this kettle. It’s so easy to use and clean up is a breeze. It takes a short amount of time to heat up water for my tea. It’s also very pretty!
Perfect tea kettle, heats water fast and easy to handle. I was very impressed with the sleek look and a great price, very happy with product and highly recommend.
Sleek and easy to use kettle. My old one broke after many years of service, and this one seemed reasonable and looks good on countertop. Boils fast as promised.
Got my electric kettle and i am amazed on how efficient it is, super big and a very modern style...5 star to this product.
Bought this electric kettle as a gift and my friends loved it. They told me it’s very useful and works so well. It’s very well made and will last long.
Super easy to use it! Size is perfect! I use it for make my coffee and tea. The water boils very quickly and is very easy to clean. The price is good.
I use a french press so need to boil water daily. No need for a tea kettle or pot on the stove. It heats up very quickly and takes up little space on the counter.
What an awesome invention! Boiling water in under 5 minutes. And automatic shut off once complete! AND I can make enough water for 4 cups of tea. Truly satisfied!
My wife LOVES this for her coffee. She uses this with a French press and it did a quick job of heating up the water for it. Great quality and feels sturdy!

reviews.reviewText: My office coffee looks cool now. It has a modern feel with a clean sleek look. Not too big which is great for me. Cordless makes it easy to use.
Love this kettle! I initially wanted a glass kettle but decided on this since it reminded me of being in Europe. No regrets. Super simple to use and is my everyday kitchen product.

Very durable
Boils fast, which is very important to me!
I love how the led opens as well, feels futuristic. Lol
The quality of this electric kettle is superb. looks really nice. it boils the water quick. have used it for several weeks now and still working good.

Want something hot in seconds Tada..! Electric kettle that’s quick in heating the water or Milk & Hot chocolate. Large kettle can be utilised for parties or travelling. Easy to clean and does not touch the heat outside the plastic. Am enjoying every day hot milk in seconds.
Very good product. Me and my wife are coffee lovers and with this electric kettle we can have water ready any time for that coffee.
I like the design. Solid and simple! (I was tired of my clear glass kittle. I like I don’t see rust and spots on a glass anymore :)
needed something to take with me when i go camping and this worked out well. I like drinking coffin the morning and this did the trick
This is having complete steel inside till the outlet of water as a single piece, making it to be easily clean and faster heating.
This electric kettle is just perfect very light and the material is sturdy. Very easy to assemble and use. Heats the water pretty fast.
bought for the office now that it's getting colder. nice to have and saves us buying hot drinks elsewhere! good volume!
I like this product which is very useful for making tea and also the hot water..I recommend this product to every one.
Works as kettle and warmer at the same time. Its way bigger than expected with a large capacity. Works well. Totally worth it.
This is a great kettle for my office. It is quick and easy to use. My last one gave off a plastic taste and this one does not.
It is very iseful escepcially for the hot water and it automatically shutofff and it has a indication and the quality is really good
I bought this for my sister in law who loves it. My SIL is English and lives her tea and this comes in handy. Great purchase
Really nice electric kettle. Very happy with my purchase. It’s easy to use and quick to warm up water. Definitely satisfied.
Love the color and how fast the water gets hot. Easy to have an the office or home. I think everyone should have one of these.
This kettle is high quality and heats up very quickly. I used for coffee and it kept it hot for our entire brunch session.
this is the kitchen appliance i didn’t even know i needed! boils water in a breeze! i use it every day now!

reviews.reviewTitle: Electric kettles are super popular in europe but I'm happy to have one in America
reviews.reviewText: I think they're more common in europe do to the higher voltage electricity here. But that's a minor difference when compared with how convenient this makes your tea making. I kind of hate waiting for water to boil and have an aversion to microwaved water. This solves both those problems, and has made my tea drinking far more efficient. I like the look and design of this particular kettle as well. It's got a quality metal feel to it.
I love how clean this kettle looks. The black finish is so beautiful especially when it sits on my counter. Super simple to use and boils the water exactly as I need it. Def worth it!

reviews.reviewTitle: The size of this kettle is perfect.

Bought it to change my old kettle, work a charm, make water hot faster.

qAndA.question: How to descale a kettle?
qAndA.answer:
If it have, please follow the tips below and say goodbye to limescale easily:
1，Cut up one whole lemon, add the pieces to the kettle.
2，Add about 500ml water to the kettle, boil then unplug. … see more

qAndA.question: Can you boil milk in the kettle?
qAndA.answer: I don’t see why not. I don’t know if it would burn the milk though.

qAndA.question: How do you know when its hot?
qAndA.answer: Hi there. It turns off when it’s hot.

qAndA.question: From the picture shown here, the kettle lip/ cover doesn’t open wide, won’t it break easily while cleaning?
qAndA.answer: The kettle doesn't open all the way. I clean mine with boiling a bit of vinegar. I only use mine for heating water so there is not much else to clean.

qAndA.question: How long is the cord?
qAndA.answer: Not sure because I never received the item.

qAndA.question: Is the inner lid plastic or stainless steel?
qAndA.answer: Dear customer, the inner lid is stainless steel.

qAndA.question: Where is it made and what is the heating element made of?
What’s the amperage?
qAndA.answer:
Dear customer,

Thanks for your interests. The rated voltage is 120V, 60Hz and rated power is 1500W.

qAndA.question: Does the side stay cool to the touch ?
I saw a review on another kettle and have a related question. Is there anything on the box indicating a cancer warning for this kettle?
qAndA.answer:
Dear customer,

Thanks for your inquiry. There is no this warning on the box. Don't worry, this kettle is BPA free and it has FDA certification. Any further questions, please go to your Amazon order detail page and contact seller. We will reply you via email to follow up your case.

qAndA.question: The inside, filter and the surface that the water touches, is all stainless steel?
qAndA.answer: Actually there is a small bit of plastic where the lid is connected to the inside of the kettle.

qAndA.question: Hi, in our country is using 220V, is it ok to use in 220v?
qAndA.answer: Not sure but I don’t think so

qAndA.question: i boiled water once and now it wont boil also theres a burnmark inside the kettle what should i do?
qAndA.answer: Try contacting the seller if you get no response then try contacting Amazon customer service

qAndA.question: How much does it weigh?
qAndA.answer: It is fairly reasonable (not sure of the exact weight, but it is neither what I would call light or heavy for a pitcher of this size). Obviously, it feels quite heavy when full. It holds a lot more water than I thought (because I did not really read the specs before buying).

qAndA.question: Does any plastic inside contacts with water while boiling?
qAndA.answer: Dear customer, no plastics will contact with water while boiling process because all materials ( inner lid, spout and pot ) are made of 304 stainless steel , which are safe and harmless enough to contact with water.

qAndA.question: Is it temp regulated? Can i set it to heat to a specific temp?
qAndA.answer: No, it gets to boiling and turns off.
